seccommerce.pdf
Class PDFAnnotationDataItem

java.lang.Object
  seccommerce.pdf.PDFAnnotationDataItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PDFAnnotationDataItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Collection of fields useful for pdf signature annotation:
A PDF signature may add annotations to the PDF Document. This class holds parameters to specify such annotations:

  1. Signature annotation
    • A JPG image (max. 220x70) may be submitted.
    • Alternatively, a preformated image is used.
    • Text may be added onto the image.
    • Default text consist of the signer and the signing date.
    • In addition, a signature reason as well as a signature location may be added.

Author:
SecCommerce Informationssysteme GmbH, Hamburg
See Also:

setPdfSigPositionInFormField

public void setPdfSigPositionInFormField(java.lang.String pdfFormFieldName)
Sets the name of a form field in which the signature is placed. A form field is just a widget annotation in the pdf document. If name if null the position value is used which is returned by getPdfSigPosition()

Parameters:
pdfFormFieldName - the name of the form field
See Also:
getPdfSigPosition()
